title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: But there was one thing which puzzled me — who put these letters in my gauntlet ? If I were right he must be a friend — but who was he ? If one of my company did it, that one must be Barabbas, or Arran's post, who had returned with us from Glenfarg, for I knew that neither of my men would do it.

title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: As we were coming into Glenfarg, below the Clochrigstane, we heard far ahead of us the sound of a horse coming towards us at a great speed.
